title: Bob Smith Industries BSI-205 Clear Slow-Cure Epoxy (4.5 oz. Combined)
description: SLOW-CURE 30 min. epoxy works best for forming reinforcing fillets on joints. It has the highest strength of our epoxies. It is waterproof and more heat resistant. SLOW-CURE can be used for bonding if you’re willing to wait overnight. Fillers such as micro balloons can be mixed with SLOW-CURE and FINISH-CURE to form a putty-like consistency. Such fillers will usually decrease the working time by about 25%. Bonded objects can be handled after 8 hours and the cured epoxy reaches full strength within 24 hours. Directions in 5 different languages.
